attributes.action: Change 'Holloway Road' of North London to 'Chuck Norris Road'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Holloway Road, London, N7.
We petition that the name of this road to Chuck Norris Road. We believe that it will become a landmark for centuries to come if this were to take place.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
